fullText: What makes 'Tootsie' work so well is that it succeeds both as a crowd-pleasing musical comedy and as a thoughtful meditation on gender roles in contemporary America.
dtliExcerpt: What makes 'Tootsie' work so well is that it succeeds both as a crowd-pleasing musical comedy and as a thoughtful meditation on gender roles in contemporary America.
